other_tests.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis, subpleural bullae, centribular emphysema at the lung bases, borderline enlarged spleen measuring 12.5 cm, hypoattenuating lesions at both kidneys likely representing simple cysts, and a 3.5 x 2.5 x 2.5 cm hypoattenuating, rim-enhancing lesion in the descending colon in the left lower quadrant likely consistent with focal diverticulitis with abscess formation.
